biolockj.module.classifier.wgs

Class Kraken2Classifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • biolockj.module.BioModuleImpl
      • biolockj.module.ScriptModuleImpl
        • biolockj.module.classifier.ClassifierModuleImpl
          • biolockj.module.classifier.wgs.Kraken2Classifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BioModule, ClassifierModule, ScriptModule

    public class Kraken2Classifier
extends ClassifierModuleImpl
implements ClassifierModule
    This BioModule assigns taxonomy to WGS sequences and translates the results into mpa-format. Command line options are defined in the online manual: http://ccb.jhu.edu/software/kraken/MANUAL.html

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static String FUNCTION_KRAKEN
      Name of the kraken function used to assign taxonomy: "runKraken2"
      protected static String KRAKEN_DATABASE
      Config property must contain file path to Kraken kmer database directory: "kraken2.db"
      protected static String KRAKEN_FILE
      File suffix added by BioLockJ to kraken output files (before translation): "_kraken2_out.txt"

    • Method Detail

      • buildScript

        public List<List<String>> buildScript(List<File> files)
                               throws Exception
        Build bash script lines to classify unpaired WGS reads with Kraken2. The inner list contains 1 bash script line used to classify 1 sample.

        Example lines:

        1. kraken2 --mpa-format --only-classified-output --threads 8 --db /database/kraken --output ./output/sample42_reported.tsv ./input/sample42.fasta
        Specified by:
        buildScript in interface ScriptModule
        Specified by:
        buildScript in class ScriptModuleImpl
        Parameters:
        files - Files in the input directory that contain only forward reads
        Returns:
        Nested list of bash scripts lines
        Throws:
        Exception - if unable to generate script lines

      • buildScriptForPairedReads

        public List<List<String>> buildScriptForPairedReads(List<File> files)
                                             throws Exception
        Build bash script lines to classify paired WGS reads with Kraken. The inner list contains 1 bash script line used to classify 1 sample (2 files: forward and reverse reads).

        Example lines:

        1. kraken --mpa-format --paired --fasta-input --only-classified-output --threads 8 --db /database/kraken --output ./output/sample42_reported.tsv ./input/sample42_R1.fasta ./input/sample42_R2.fasta
          *
        Specified by:
        buildScriptForPairedReads in interface ScriptModule
        Overrides:
        buildScriptForPairedReads in class ScriptModuleImpl
        Parameters:
        files - Files in the input directory that contain only paired reads
        Returns:
        Nested list of bash scripts lines
        Throws:
        Exception - if unable to generate the script lines

      • checkDependencies

        public void checkDependencies()
                       throws Exception
        Verify that none of the derived command line parameters are included in Config."exe.classifierParams". Also verify:
        • Config."kraken2.db" is a valid file path valid parameters
        Specified by:
        checkDependencies in interface BioModule
        Overrides:
        checkDependencies in class ClassifierModuleImpl
        Throws:
        Exception - thrown if missing or invalid dependencies are found

      • getWorkerScriptFunctions

        public List<String> getWorkerScriptFunctions()
                                      throws Exception
        This method generates the required bash function: "runKraken2"
        Specified by:

        Overrides:

        Returns:
        Bash script lines for the functions
